physical_appearance: "The image shows a medal. It is circular in shape. It is encased in a transparent rectangular container. A crest bearing the words ""Tamil Reform Association"" is present at the top of the medal's front surface. ""Tamils Festival 1982
subject_terms_1: Organized by Tamils Reform Association Souvenir"" is stated below the medal. A rectangular metallic block that is fashioned into floral patterns surrounds the medal." festivals associations
